version_description:
- updated blocking list
- enhanced popup blocking
- performance improvements

- enhanced protection from malicious redirects
- enhanced blocking filters
- UI updates
- fixed crashing during launch on iPhone 5S

- updated UI
- adblocker enhancements

- upgraded interface
- detailed whitelisting directly from Safari
- bypassing anti-adblock traps with Safari button
- ability to block social media button (Facebook Like, Google +, Twitter, etc)
- hide obtrusive "allow cookies" banners
- ability to hide comment sections on popular websites
- blocking of known malware poised websites
- make Safari safe for kids blocking of adult adverts & webpages
- iCloud sync between your devices
- reporting of problematic websites directly from Safari
- block scripts by domain

Keep the feature requests coming, thanks for all the support!
- fix allowing users who purchased AdBlock Pro previously to enjoy new features for free

+ updated blocking list
+ enhanced font blocking
+ solved issue with emojis on websites

- improved blocking for English, Spanish and Russian speaking countries
- improved Safari extension (you can quickly enable/disable images)
- rebranded to original name AdBuster
+ updated blocking list
+ updated for iPhone X

+ block list update
+ small fixes

+ improved youtube ad blocking
+ dark / light theme customization

(open the app after update at least once to load new blocking list)

+ improved setup tutorial
+ improved Youtube ad-blocking

+ updated ad-blocking on Youtube
+ added country-specific ad-blocking
